property.name: ServiceName

property.tp:docstring: A specific object associated with the active connection.

property.name: Devices
property.tp:docstring: Array of object paths representing devices which are part of this active connection.

property.name: State
property.tp:docstring: The state of this active connection.

property.name: Default
property.tp:docstring: Whether this active connection is the default connection, i.e. whether it currently owns the default route.

interface.tp:docstring: Represents an active connection to a Virtual Private Network.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values

property.name: VpnState

property.name: Banner
property.tp:docstring: The banner string of the VPN connection.

signal.name: VpnStateChanged
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when the state of the VPN connection has changed.

arg.name: state
arg.tp:docstring: The new state of the VPN connection.

arg.name: reason
arg.tp:docstring: Reason code describing the change to the new state.
